message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique qualities and the time invested in its creation. Considering its worth to you stands at $800,000, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at a price that aims to maximize the value for both parties involved. My proposed price for this remarkable product is $950,000. I believe this figure strikes a balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the perceived value to you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies all parties.
